package.name: BigSnoozey
package.shortDescription: Adds a customizable blur under your Big snooze buttons for alarm, no snooze alarm and mobile timer on lockscreen.

descriptionlist.description: Big snooze buttons for alarm, no snooze alarm and mobile timer on lockscreen.
